(Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-warp-webserver/src/webserver.rs] [Function: serve()] [Non-thread-safe routes] The routes parameter requires Send + Sync at line 37 - but are the underlying handlers truly thread-safe, or can race conditions in route handlers corrupt validator state? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-warp-webserver/src/webserver.rs] [Function: serve()] [Multiple serve() invocations] Can serve() be called multiple times concurrently on the same WebServer instance, and if so, does this create race conditions in warp's internal state? (Medium)
